subject: re:Introduce special discounts for all our customers
body:
Dear customer.
The pharmacy you shop at got too expensive? Why spend more if you have the opportunity to buy medications of the same generic quality for less?
Investigations show that the only ones to be protected from buying fake pills are those who shop at licensed Web pharmacies dealing straight with the manufacturer with no third parties involved (such as CanadianPharmacy). Try CanadianPharmacy our prices for real generic medications are the best.
Don't look for prices lower than those at CanadianPharmacy anything that is cheaper is a fake.
Yours faithfully,Anna Ponce
